document_data.name: Knowledge-Hold
document_data.mainbody: The '''Knowledge-Hold''' was a library located in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite comic/Mindbreaker 1|7-8}}
document_data.Services: The library served as a repository for historical knowledge and unique articles of written work.
document_data.History:
[[File:Knowledge-Hold Int.png|thumb|right|250px|''The [[Heroes of Baldur's Gate]] facing off against cultists of [[the Absolute]].'']]
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Knowledge-Hold was infiltrated by the [[Cult of the Absolute]]. The cult managed to brainwash and then kill head librarian [[Hayley Kroe]], using her sacrifice to summon a strange portal to some unknown locale.{{Cite comic/Mindbreaker 1|16-20}} Fortunately, the cult's initial efforts were thwarted by the [[Heroes of Baldur's Gate]]. The adventurers managed to hold off the cult until [[the Watch]] could arrive, without disrupting too many priceless works.{{Cite comic/Mindbreaker 2|1-6}}
document_data.Inhabitants:
* [[Haley Kroe]], head librarian of Knowledge-Hold.
* [[Matrikay]], [[wizard]] and scholar of eldritch lore.{{Cite comic/Evil at Baldur's Gate 3|3}}
